sourcesContent:
import { Text, View, Button, Image, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';

const PlacingOrder = (props) => {
    return (
        < View styles={{borderRadius: '20px'}}>
            <Text style={{fontWeight: '500', marginTop: 20}}>Оформление заказа</Text>
            <View style={styles.orderInfo}>
                <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', marginTop: 10}}>
                    <Image style={styles.image} source={require('C:/Users/renat/Desktop/Prog/Lessons/lesson16/shop/assets/delivery.png')}/>
                    <Text>Выберите тип доставки</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.button}>
                    <Button title='Курьером' color={'#EE7100'}/>
                </View>

                <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', marginTop: 10}}>
                    <Image style={styles.image} source={require('C:/Users/renat/Desktop/Prog/Lessons/lesson16/shop/assets/clock.png')}/>
                    <Text>Выберите время и дату доставки</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.button}>
                    <Button title='12:00 05.09.2022' color={'#EE7100'}/>
                </View>

                <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', marginTop: 10}}>
                    <Image style={styles.image} source={require('C:/Users/renat/Desktop/Prog/Lessons/lesson16/shop/assets/payment.png')}/>
                    <Text>Выберите способ оплаты</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.button}>
                    <Button title='Банковская карта' color={'#EE7100'}/>
                </View>
                
                <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', marginTop: 20}}>
                    <View style={{flexDirection: 'column'}}>
                        <Text>{props.productsAmount} товара</Text>
                        <Text>Доставка</Text>
                        <Text>Начислим баллы</Text>
                    </View>
                    <View style={{flexDirection: 'column', marginLeft: 60}}>
                        <Text style={{color: '#EE7100'}}>{props.totalPrice} p.</Text>
                        <Text style={{color: '#EE7100'}}>Бесплатно</Text>
                        <Text style={{color: '#EE7100'}}>0</Text>
                    </View>
                </View>
            </View>
        </View>
    );
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    orderInfo: {
      alignContent: 'flex-start',
      width: '90%',
      marginTop: 5,
      paddingTop: 5,
      paddingRight: 20,
      paddingLeft: 20,
      paddingBottom: 20,
      shadowColor: "#000000",
      shadowOpacity: 0.8,
      shadowRadius: 2,
      shadowOffset: {
        height: 1,
        width: 1
      }
    },
    button: {
        backgroundColor: '#EE7100',
        marginTop: 8
    },
    image: {
        justifyContent: 'flex-end',
        width: 20,
        height: 20,
        marginRight: 8
    }
})

export default PlacingOrder;
